name: china_osm_v20_500m
title: Locations of Chinese development projects - 500m Buffer
description: Locations of Chinese development projects from AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset v2.0. These boundaries represent a subset of projects from the dataset for which precise locations were found using OpenStreetMaps. For all locations a 500m buffer was applied.

options.group_title: Global Chinese Development Finance - AidData v2.0

extras.citation: Malik, A., Parks, B., Russell, B., Lin, J., Walsh, K., Solomon, K., Zhang, S., Elston, T., and S. Goodman. (2021). Banking on the Belt and Road: Insights from a new global dataset of 13,427 Chinese development projects. Williamsburg, VA: AidData at William & Mary.
